articles.content:
Gold medal and honorary diploma to Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A gold medal and an honorary diploma were sent to President Kim Il Sung by the institute for the fidelity in the work of France in the run-up to the 53rd anniversary of the DPRK.
 The gold medal and honorary diploma were conveyed to an official concerned by Patrick Brunot, chairman of the Institute for the Fidelity in the Work of France who is a French delegate for the study of the Juche idea, on a visit to Korea.   
 The chairman said that the immortal feats performed by Kim Il Sung on behalf of humankind will remain long in the hearts of the world progressives struggling for independence, guided by the Juche idea.

articles.content:
Gold medal and honorary diploma to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A gold medal and honorary diploma were sent to leader Kim Jong Il by the Institute for the Fidelity in the Work of France in the countdown to the 53rd anniversary of the DPRK.
 The gold medal and honorary diploma were conveyed to an official concerned by Patrick Brunot, chairman of the Institute for the Fidelity in the Work of France who is a French delegate for the study of the Juche idea, on a visit to Korea.    
 On the occasion the chairman said Kim jong Il is a leader and a standard-bearer of struggle to realize independence of humankind. His international prestige is the source of more world focus and expectations of Korea.

articles.content:
Title of Labor Heroine awarded to Kye Sun Hui
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Title of Labor Heroine of the DPRK was awarded to Kye Sun Hui, Judoist of the Moranbong District Sports Group in Pyongyang.
 According to the September 6 decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, she has steadily adapted herself to the Juche-based judo tactics to prove successful in international games. And she defeated all her opponents with her strong will-power at the 2001 world judo championships to carry off a gold medal and demonstrate the dignity and honor of Juche Korea.

articles.content:
Congratulatory message to Seychellois President
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sept. 7 sent a congratulatory message to France Albert Rene upon his reelection as President of the Republic of Seychelles.
 Extending warm congratulations to him, the message noted that his continued assumption of heavy responsibility as President is an expression of the Seychellois people's deep trust and expectation for him.    
 Expressing belief that the existing good relations of friendship between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished him fresh success in his responsible work.

articles.title: National meeting marks DPRK birthday
articles.content:
Greetings to Tajik President
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on September 3 sent a message of greetings to Tajik President Emomali Rakhmonov on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of its independence.
 The message sent warm congratulations to the Tajik President and people.    
 Expressing belief that the excellent friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president great success in his work to defend the independence of the country and achieve its prosperity.
